Name: Ignis Corruption
About the game: Collect resources to expand your village, build houses, raise villagers and improve your defense. In ignis corruption, resources act as the base currency for the creation of your world, choose well where you will allocate them or suffer the consequences. The strategic positioning of your buildings is essential to follow a successful path. Place extractors for wood, stone, iron and more. Fighting to survive is a small part of a much larger task. Fight enemies, survive natural disasters, supply your village, send resources, grow your community, locate and destroy the source of evil. Features present in the game (so far) Stylized Graphics City building system Unit control system Resource collection system Food planting system Natural disaster system Classic RTS style camera controls Library for researching new technologies Market to trade resources Quest system Procedural Map
